about.title: About Dr. Ramin Sami
about.description: Dr. Ramin Sami, an internist and specialist in pulmonary diseases and ICU, entered Isfahan University of Medical Sciences in 1994. After completing various educational courses, he received the subspecialty board in pulmonary diseases and ICU from Shahid Beheshti University of Medical Sciences in Tehran in 2011, ranking first. Since then, he has been working as a university faculty member.

asthmaAllergy.title: Diagnosis and Treatment of Asthma and Respiratory Allergies
asthmaAllergy.description: Providing the latest diagnostic and therapeutic methods for complete control of asthma and allergies in children and adults, to improve quality of life and comfortable breathing.

copd.title: Management of Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
copd.description: Comprehensive treatment planning including medication, pulmonary rehabilitation, and necessary education to reduce symptoms and prevent disease progression.

bronchoscopy.title: Diagnostic and Therapeutic Bronchoscopy
bronchoscopy.description: Performing bronchoscopy with advanced equipment for sampling (biopsy), accurate diagnosis of lung diseases, and necessary therapeutic interventions.

spirometry.title: Pulmonary Function Tests (Spirometry)
spirometry.description: Accurate assessment of lung capacity and function through spirometry for correct diagnosis of diseases and monitoring treatment progress.

ildFibrosis.title: Interstitial Lung Diseases and Pulmonary Fibrosis
ildFibrosis.description: A specialized approach in the diagnosis and management of complex lung diseases such as fibrosis, aiming to slow disease progression and maintain respiratory function.

sleepApnea.title: Sleep-Related Breathing Disorders (Sleep Apnea)
sleepApnea.description: Evaluation and treatment of sleep apnea to improve sleep quality, reduce daytime fatigue, and prevent cardiovascular complications.

cancerScreening.title: Early Detection and Screening for Lung Cancer
cancerScreening.description: Providing screening services for at-risk individuals and diagnosing early-stage lung cancer using modern methods to increase the chances of successful treatment.

consultation.title: Specialized Pulmonary Consultation (Second Opinion)
consultation.description: Providing consultation before major surgeries, specialized review of complex medical records (second opinion), and guiding patients to choose the best treatment path.

bronchitis.title: What Is Bronchitis and How Is It Treated?
bronchitis.description: Bronchitis, the inflammation of the bronchial tubes in the lungs, is one of the most common causes of coughing. This article explores its symptoms, causes, and the latest treatment methods.

asthma.description: Living with asthma can be challenging, but with the right strategies it can be well‑managed. This article offers practical tips to improve your quality of life.

longCovid.description: Many COVID‑19 survivors still struggle with respiratory complications. This article reviews symptoms and treatment approaches for Long COVID.

quittingSmoking.description: Quitting smoking provides countless health benefits for your lungs and entire body. Learn the key steps and tips for success on this journey.
